would enjoy sitting next to him.'' McCarthy pointed to House Speaker John Andrew Boehner 's recent remarks that the shooting last week of Arizona Democratic Rep. And I think that, that comment set a tone to what that House looks like, McCarthy said. of his fans think even more highly of him now than before, according to a survey released on Wednesday by show business newspaper, The Hollywood Reporter. The actor's rabble-rousing has done nothing to harm Two and A Half Men's standing as the most-watched comedy on U.S. television with some 15 million regular viewers. In fact, 26 percent of those questioned for the Hollywood Reporter survey done by polling firm Penn Schoen Berland view Carlos Irwin Estevez `` much more or`` somewhat more'' favorably after his recent antics. At the same time, Israel signaled Saturday it is considering easing the blockade, although officials provided no details.
